public true false This flow will send a reminder notification to responsible users for a KPI if no action is taken on a signal discovered by KPI Signals. The reminder configuration can be done by the responsible user in the KPI Signals configuration page under the "Notification" tab. kpi_signals_reminder_notification_flow
